title: Philips HR2221 Blender

listingInfo.title: Philips HR2221 – Blender, fully functional, complete accessories
listingInfo.attributes: Main unit + cup + lid + blade; blends fruits and small ice; cup shown clean in photos.

complaint: Buyer claims the blender cup arrived cracked. Seller provided pre-shipment photos showing no cracks. No packaging or unboxing video from either party. It is impossible to determine when the damage occurred (likely logistic damage but unprovable). Not SNAD — Neutral Damage.

chatLog.text: Hi, is the blender still available? I want a small one to try out first.
Yes, still available. I didn’t use it much—selling because I'm moving.
Can it blend well? I mainly blend fruits and occasionally small ice cubes.
Yes, works fine. Fruits are smooth, and small ice cubes are okay too. Very stable in my experience.
Is the cup still clean? I don’t like cups with too many scratches.
There are some signs of use, but overall it’s clean. I'll take photos for you.
(Sent two cup photos)
Okay, that works. Are all accessories included?
Yes, all included.
Can you do NT$800?
Sure, NT$800 for you.
Please ship to 7-11 Zhonghua Store, COD. Thank you.
No problem. Shipping fee NT$60, paid at pickup.
I’ll ship it this afternoon.
Order created — Order ID: TW-13058
Shipped.
Package has arrived at the store.
I picked it up and paid NT$860.
I received the item. While washing the cup I found a crack on the side. I really can’t use it like this.
Really? Let me find the photos I took before shipping. It definitely wasn’t cracked when I sent it.
(Sent pre-shipment photos — cup intact)
Yes, the cup in your photos isn’t cracked. But the one I received definitely is. I don’t know when it happened. But I can’t use it now.
Maybe it was damaged during delivery. Was the outer box dented?
The box looks normal. But the item I received is damaged, so I want to return it.
A full refund is difficult for me because I have proof the item was intact before shipping. I don’t think this is my fault.
But I can’t use it at all like this…
I just submitted a return request in the app. Please watch for the system notification.
…Alright, let’s see how the system handles it.
